item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Stolen manhole cover at boating pool in Riverside gardens, 1st September
item.description:
Re already reported missing manhole cover, this manhole contains the stop cock to fill up the boating pool. As the cover is missing, anyone, probably kids, can and do, turn on the water. As the pool is already full, the water just runs out of the overflow into the river Cray. I have just turned off the stop cock, again! In a water shortage period, please replace and lock the cover ASAP. With Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cray Avenue, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The block paving has sunk around 6 foot by 5 foot Square, 1st September
item.description:
It has sunk around 4 inches in the past 6 months but has now became dangerous, especially as the nights are drawing in, i live at 93 Rope street and its outside my window, ive seen a fair few people take a tumble, and its getting worse,
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rope Street, Rotherhithe, London

item.title: Abandoned Blue Nissan, 1st September
item.description:
Blue Nissan, reg plate BD67 UCY, has been abandoned in the turning circle at the end of Doggetts Close. It has been dumped half on the pavement, half on the road Car has been there for roughly four weeks. It is taxed and insured until February. Car is in the turning circle which is preventing large vehicles from being able to turn around at the end of the cul de sac, which is causing issues.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Doggetts Court, East Barnet, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No street cleaning for months, 1st September
item.description:
There has been no street cleaner for months. The weeds are over grown, drains are blocked, there are leaves everywhere and litter everywhere. No street cleaner for the following roads, Benares road, Bannockburn Road, Hylton Street, Brookdene Road, Kashgar Road and Blithdale Road. Please can you send someone.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Benares Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
